author: M Dinesh Varma
text:
There won’t be another dull wall on the premises of Jipmer, with the administration deciding to decorate interiors with paintings by its patients, students and staff.

Jipmer has begun displaying some of these paintings at various departments and other buildings. S.C. Parija, Director, Jipmer, said the institute plans to have an art gallery eventually to showcase these contributions from students, staff and patients. On Saturday, Dr. Parija unveiled the first painting done by an MBBS Student. Earlier, the Medical Oncology Department organised a painting and drawing orientation training for paediatric cancer patients.
title: Paintings to adorn Jipmer walls
